your own business

Earn money on your terms when you create your own store with inventory and pricing that you choose.
That's eeosk.

You're in control of what you sell and how much you earn.

Select the home d√©cor items you love from the eeosk catalog. Add items to your store and they're ready for customers to purchase.

You set the price for each item and decide whether to earn more or offer a bargain. It's up to you.

Your own website

Selling on eeosk means you have your own online presence that you own.

We give you the tools to create your online store in minutes. Set up your own website on your own domain and brand it however you want.

Set your own price.

With eeosk, prices really are up to you, so you determine how much you earn with each sale. Not sure where to start? We provide recommended prices to get you started.

It's your business, so you make the decisions.

Zero setup cost, no fees

eeosk makes money by supplying inventory, so you won't be surprised with any fees. There are no setup fees, seller fees, or final value fees.

When you set a price, you'll see how much you will earn with a sale. When you sell that item, that's exactly how much money you'll receive.

eeosk is completely free to use.
